methods: abstract Object getMetric(String metricName) Return the value for the specified metric.
abstract long getReceivedBytesCount() Returns the number of bytes transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.
abstract long getRequestCount() Returns the number of requests transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.
abstract long getResponseCount() Returns the number of responses transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.
abstract long getSentBytesCount() Returns the number of bytes transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.
abstract void reset() Resets the counts
